mapper.select: SELECT tbr.*, tu.ID, tp.* from tb_ban_report tbr INNER JOIN tb_user tu ON tbr.reporter = tu.seq LEFT JOIN tb_post tp ON tbr.target = tp.seq WHERE tbr.targettype = 'P' and tbr.ban_result IS NULL
SELECT tbr.*, tu.ID, tr.* from tb_ban_report tbr INNER JOIN tb_user tu ON tbr.reporter = tu.seq LEFT JOIN tb_reply tr ON tbr.target = tr.seq WHERE tbr.targettype = 'R' and tbr.ban_result IS NULL
select seq, reporter, BanCode, ban_result, targettype from tb_ban_report where seq = #{seq}
SELECT tu.*, COUNT(tbr.seq) AS ban_cnt FROM tb_ban_report tbr INNER JOIN tb_reply tr ON tbr.target = tr.seq INNER JOIN tb_user tu ON tr.WRITER = tu.SEQ WHERE tbr.ban_result = 1 GROUP BY tu.SEQ
SELECT tbr.*, tr.* FROM tb_ban_report tbr INNER JOIN tb_reply tr ON tbr.target = tr.seq AND tr.WRITER = #{seq} WHERE tbr.ban_result = 1
